old:
いつどこで侵食魔の
襲撃を受けるやらわからぬ
――気が抜けないというのも辛いな
column2:
It's hard to know when and where the Corruption will strike
--and it's hard not to be distracted.

old: おい、警戒を怠らないでくれ
column2: Hey, don't let your guard down.

old:
戦える者が戦わねばならん
こんなところで膝をつくわけには――
column2: Those who can fight must fight. We can't just fall to our knees here—
